channel.title: Will Gibson AKA Walter Ego
channel.description: Recent content on Will Gibson AKA Walter Ego

item.title: Musician Producer Identity
item.description:
You can start here for now Will Gibson on Spotify, I will fill in the gaps and get more detailed soon, promise.

Also, my band Article released an album recently.

item.title: Refurbishing a Dog Wheelchair in Goa
item.description:
Refurbishing a dog wheelchair in Goa

This is a placeholder, I’ve been refurbishing dog wheelchairs at ARC South Goa using things available in Chaudi (the local town) plus some ideas from Liz Gibson, and will be making a page here to help other folk like me who want to help, but are better at fixing the things around the dogs than the dogs themselves.

item.title: DevOps Software Engineer Identity
item.description:
Some “day job” info is on my LinkedIn profile.

Maybe I’ll write a blog post sometime…

item.title: Will Gibson things
item.description:
A place where I will put some words about me things.

I’ve only started putting this together so I can share some learnings on refurbiushing dog wheelchairs in Goa with the next encumbent, but I’ve been meaning to do something like this site for a while, so I will.

2026-02-07
